The first bar chart displays the total amount of number of different **types of pets**. 
From the first chart, among the various types of pets, such as dogs, cats,
rabbits, birds, etc, the largest number of the sheltered animals in the dataset
of Montgomery County is _cats_.

The second bar chart has a selecting bar of specific breed between four
different animal types, which include, _cats_, _dogs_, _other_, and _all_ a
total of four options. By selecting different option, the bar chart displays 
the total number of amount of each particular breed. 
Through the second chart, in terms of the specific breeds, _domestic shorthair cats_ and _pitbulls_ are the most sheltered pets.
